LanguageData.Bullet_DMS_AMR.label: heavy rifle bullet
LanguageData.DMS_Bullet_MiniMachineGun.label: riot machinegun bullet
LanguageData.DMS_Bullet_RiotRevolver.label: 20 gauge beanbag
LanguageData.DMS_Bullet_RiotShotgun.label: 4 gauge bean bag
LanguageData.DMS_ElephantGun.label: elephant rifle
LanguageData.DMS_ElephantGun.description: Single-shot high caliber heavy hunting rifle. While made to hunt giant games or stop large hostile lifeform with sheer kinetic energy, it is also used by early industrial colonies against mechanoids thanks to its simple manufacture requirements.
LanguageData.DMS_ElephantGun.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.DMS_ElephantGun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_ElephantGun.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: elephant rifle
LanguageData.DMS_KnuckledusterRevolver.label: knuckleduster Revolver
LanguageData.DMS_KnuckledusterRevolver.description: Minature self-defense weapon commonly found on midworlds, barely takes up any space when folded. Accepts multiple calibers and may also used as a knuckle in a pinch.
LanguageData.DMS_MiniMachineGun.label: Riot LMG
LanguageData.DMS_MiniMachineGun.description: Pistol caliber machinegun designed for colony defense. can chop down unarmored enemy hords and prisoner riots with ease.
LanguageData.DMS_Revolver.label: Riot Revolver
LanguageData.DMS_Revolver.description: a double-action revolver designed to load shotgun ammo. it was designed for personal Defense purpose but soon became an optional weapon for mech solders because it can be used against most of enemy types at the same time.
LanguageData.DMS_Revolver.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.DMS_Revolver.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_Revolver.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Riot Revolver
LanguageData.DMS_RiotShotgun.label: slug gun
LanguageData.DMS_RiotShotgun.description: a high caliber rifled shotgun manufactured with stamped component,design for riot operation and disable hostile mech unit.
LanguageData.DMS_RiotShotgun.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_RiotShotgun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_RiotShotgun.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: slug gun
LanguageData.DMS_SniperGrenadeLauncher.label: sniper grenade launcher
LanguageData.DMS_SniperGrenadeLauncher.description:
precise grenade launcher designed to fit in anti-sniper role.
This weapon is designed specially for automatroid use, thus normal human may be unable to use them normally without external assistance equipment or being extra strong.
LanguageData.DMS_SurvivalRifle.label: survival rifle
LanguageData.DMS_SurvivalRifle.description: Foldable rifle issued to war machine crew members for survival need. Accepts multiple common calibers.
LanguageData.DMS_SurvivalRifle.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_SurvivalRifle.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_SurvivalRifle.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: survival rifle
